ygData.msgSnippet: Phobia wonders about the tone of voice used to mention Magmatron. Was it fear or loyalty he sensed? Either way Phobia knew Magmatron wasn t someone to be

Phobia wonders about the tone of voice used to mention Magmatron. Was 
it fear or loyalty he sensed? Either way Phobia knew Magmatron wasn't 
someone to be crossed.

Yes I would be honered to see your base. Can a tour be aranged? Never 
mind, I will ask your leader. I'm sure I wouldn't be a problem.

-- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Dachande85@a... wrote:
> ::Bazooka::
> 
>     "I am not in charge here. I can take you to who is though." 
Bazooka 
> replied. "And you may thank Magmatron for the curtosy of being 
here. If you 
> would follow me. Autoguns offline." He lead the way into the base.
